title: A pui a pangte u
lyrics:
A pui a pangte u,
A khawngaihnaah hian,
Tunah lo kal vek r'u;
Kal bo leh tawh lovin.
A tlai ta hle hmanhmawh ula,(2)
Khawngaihna kawng a hawn chhungin.

Isuan a koh chhung hian,
Chhuanlam tur zawng lovin;
Mitdel, retheite u,
Mi zawng zawng lo haw r'u.
Tunah engkim a peih ta e,(2)
Hmun tha ber pawh in chang thei e.

Isua kraws thisen hlu,
A thlawnin a far lo,
A tuarna zawng zawng chu,
Pakhat mah a bo lo.
A ram zau nan thil ropui ber,(2)
Hmangaihnain a ti zo ta.

Mi zawng zawng lo kun se,
Beramno hmah hian;
A hming fak mawlh rawh se,
A ropui em vang hian.
Lei leh van mi'n thu khat vuain,(2)
Chatuanin I chawimawi zel ang.
